definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: only in combin. ´[[ח]] [[הַגּוֹיִם]], Ḥarosheth of the nations (v. [[גּוֹי]]), Ju Jdg 4:2, Jdg 4:13, Jdg 4:16; perh. mod. el-Ḥariṯîye, on right bank of lower Kishon, v. Thomson:Land and Book; Central Palestine, 1883, 215 ff. Bd:Pal 241 Be Bla Cooke:Hist. Deb. 3 GASm:Geog. 393.
